name: Gravity Sketch VR
detailed_description:
Gravity Sketch is an immersive 3D creation tool. You can create detailed professional grade 3D models, scenes, and artwork in a fast, intuitive way! From idea conception, design directly in 3D and take your models out of the scene into another design tool, CAD software, game engine, or 3D print platform. Upload your creations directly from the app to the cloud and share with others in a matter of seconds. Gravity Sketch will change your design workflow and the way you share 3D content.

Basic (One-time purchase) Features:

- Free 3D and straight-line strokes
- Revolved surfaces
- Planar surfaces
- Curved surfaces
- Sketch on surfaces
- Copy and Paste geometry
- Symmetry
- Scale up and down the entire sketch as well as individual strokes or group of strokes.
- Import 3D models and manipulate
- Export/Import .OBJ with layers and orientation
- 4 Layers
- 3D grid
- Control Point Snapping
- Left Handed Setting
- Leap Motion Mode (BETA and Windows only)
- 4 Environments (Light, Dark, Warehouse, HDR)
- Basic Workspace Panel

*Commercial use limitations: Small independent projects

Pro Subscription Features:

- Basic Features
- Export as .iges
- 12 Layers
- Custom environments (coming soon)
- Export as .fbx (coming soon)
- Pro Workspace Panel

*Commercial use limitations: If your company earns over $10,000/yr from work involving Gravity Sketch you are a Pro user

Studio Subscription Features:

- Pro Features
- Gravity Sketch Import Plugin for Rhino (BETA and Windows only)
- Studio Workspace Panel

*Commercial use limitations: If your company earns over $100k – 100M/yr you need the Studio license

Enterprise Licence - Contact us directly at info@gravitysketch.com

short_description: Gravity Sketch is an immersive 3D creation tool. You can create detailed professional grade 3D models, scenes, and artwork in a fast, intuitive way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: 3GHz 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 56
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
